policy: Official-brand sources only (brand-owned pages). Timeline/map only includes entries with verified founding year and verified region attribution in this dataset.

items.name: Prada
items.one_liner: An Italian fashion house founded in Milan in 1913.

items.name: Gucci
items.one_liner: An Italian fashion house founded in Florence in 1921.

items.name: Fendi
items.one_liner: An Italian fashion house founded in Rome in 1925.

items.name: Salvatore Ferragamo
items.one_liner: An Italian fashion house established in Florence in 1927.

items.name: Nordica
items.one_liner: An Italian ski brand founded in 1939 in the Montebelluna area.

items.name: Diadora
items.one_liner: An Italian sportswear and footwear brand serving athletes since 1948.
